      • normalizeID

        public static java.lang.String normalizeID(java.lang.CharSequence word)
        Normalize the ID value. This will replace common invalid characters with an underscore.
        Parameters:
        word - the word.
        Returns:
        the converted word. If the input was null, empty string is returned.
